more information to Eastrans Nominations changes effective Saturday MMBtu was delivered into the Mobil Beaumont redelivery point This will be considered a sale into Mobile Beaumont There will not be gas redelivered into Mobil Beaumont on July th st or August st Forwarded by Marta K HendersonHoustonPEFSPEC on AM Marta K Henderson AM To Darrel F EC John A EC Chad W EC Michael R EC Bruce EC William E EC Donna C EC Julia A EC Sharon EC cc Subject Eastrans Nominations changes effective On the compressor went down for HPL deliveries into Eastrans MMbtu was delivered on Redeliveries for the th will be into HPL from FCV The differential of MMBtu MMBtu MMBtu will be a sale into HPL On July th st and August st there is gas flow MMBtu per day will be sold into HPL

Correction to Nominations for Eastrans Cc result of the East Texas Plant problem late yesterday the following is revised nominations for Eastrans for April As of pm on through am on nomination Deliveries MMBtu into Eastrans Redeliveries MMBtu Beginning am on nomination Deliveries MMBtu into Eastrans Redeliveries MMBtu into PGE MMBtu from Fuels Cotton Valley into HPL MMBtu into HPLs Carwheel at Carthage MMBtu into Mobil Beaumont at HSC

Correction to Nomination for Eastrans Cc Bruce McMills absence I am sending the following correction for Eastrans Nominations Bruce has confirmed the correction with Darren Farmer Correction for nomination Deliveries MMBtu into Eastrans Redeliveries into PGE from Fuels Cotton Valley into HPL into HPLs Carwheel at Carthage into Mobil Beaumont at HSC into Mobil Beaumont at HSC

REVISION Eastrans Nomination change effective and redeliveries will still be effective at am However the MMBtudy Fuels Cotton Valley gas will not be priced per the Transaction Agreement and will not flow into HPL Forwarded by Marta K HendersonHoustonPEFSPEC on PM Marta K Henderson To Connie EC Daniel C EC Darrel F EC Donna AM C EC Donna J EC John A EC John C EC Julia A EC Lee C EC Michael R EC Poe EC Ronald C EC Sharon EC William E EC cc Subject Eastrans Nomination change effective Please decrease deliveries to Eastrans to MMBtudy effective and maintain at until further notified The redeliveries will be as well Fuels Cotton Valley gas will be valued per Paragraph of the Contract Price per MMBtu section in the Transaction Agreement

Flow change for Fuels Cotton Valley Redeliveries into HPLMarch the redeliveries into HPL from Fuels Cotton Valley for the Eastrans deal will increase to approximately MMBtudy This change should continue through March th or th The reason for the change is an operational emergency DEFS typically delivers approximately MMBtudy into TXU Lone Star This delivery will not be able to occur because the Alford B compressor needs to get into the shop for maintenance This compressor will be out of commission for the month of March The Busby compressor will compress the usual MMBtudy of Fuels Cotton Valley redelivery gas as well as the MMBtudy of TXU Lone Star redelivery gas A different redelivery point with TXU Lone Star is being established and should be available by March th or th At this point in time we will take the HPL Fuels Cotton Valley redelivery gas to zero and balance the redeliveries between the two points Therefore DEFS will not change the delivery or redelivery nominations in place for Eastrans After the new TXU Lone Star redelivery point is put into place and the points are volume balanced it is our intent to have redeliveries of MMBtudy from Fuels Cotton Valley and MMBtudy into PGE which is what is in place effective for Eastrans

Flow change for Fuels Cotton Valley Redeliveries into HPLMarch the redeliveries into HPL from Fuels Cotton Valley for the Eastrans deal will increase to approximately MMBtudy This change should continue through March th or th The reason for the change is an operational emergency DEFS typically delivers approximately MMBtudy into TXU Lone Star This delivery will not be able to occur because the Alford B compressor needs to get into the shop for maintenance This compressor will be out of commission for the month of March The Busby compressor will compress the usual MMBtudy of Fuels Cotton Valley redelivery gas as well as the MMBtudy of TXU Lone Star redelivery gas A different redelivery point with TXU Lone Star is being established and should be available by March th or th At this point in time we will take the HPL Fuels Cotton Valley redelivery gas to zero and balance the redeliveries between the two points Therefore DEFS will not change the delivery or redelivery nominations in place for Eastrans After the new TXU Lone Star redelivery point is put into place and the points are volume balanced it is our intent to have redeliveries of MMBtudy from Fuels Cotton Valley and MMBtudy into PGE which is what is in place effective for Eastrans
